title: The 'Top N' and 'Bottom N' functions do not work
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Create a report parameter.
3. Drag a chart to the layout.
4. In the chart dialogue, click the 'select data' tab.
5. Click the 'filters' button.
6. Set two filter conditions:
   a) Use the 'Top N' function.
   b) Use the report parameter.
7. [Additional context or specific actions to reproduce the issue.]
